thread.title: What's Your Favorite Quote From Science Fiction?
thread.title_full: What's Your Favorite Quote From Science Fiction?

author: Katharine Trendacosta
title: What's Your Favorite Quote From Science Fiction?
text:
Go to permalink It’s a Kirk speech? No? (Image: Star Trek, CBS) 
Science fiction has a lot of great quotes that have stood the test of time. Funny, inspiring, just beautifully written sentences—there are a lot to choose from. So what’s your favorite? What’s the quotation you find yourself saying all the time? Advertisement 
For me, it isn’t a brilliant quote from a good piece of writing. It’s from “Spock’s Brain.” Yes, I know it’s weird that the worst episode of Star Trek is the one I can’t stop quoting. But if there is a funnier, more versatile quote than “Brain and brain, what is brain?” I have not found it.
